data.title: Great pizza and awesome craft beer - Get Some!
data.meta_description: Check out our featured specials, full menu, and beer menu. Download a printer friendly version of our full menu or kids menu.
data.meta_site_name: Pies & Pints | Great pizza and awesome craft beer - Get Some!
data.text:

Starters

$15

$7 / $8 with cheese

Chips & House Made Salsa GF

Pork & Pepper Nachos seasoned black beans, pulled pork, jalapeños, cheddar cheese, salsa, scallions & chipotle crema GF

Greens

Perfect to share or large enough to make a meal, our salads are made with the freshest ingredients. All of our dressings & even the focaccia bread for our croutons are made in-house. (Small serves 1–2 / Large serves 2–3)

Simple Salad greens, red cabbage, red onions, tomatoes & house-made croutons tossed in house vinaigrette or creamy gorgonzola

$7

House Salad greens, red cabbage, red onions, tomatoes, pepperoncinis, mozzarella & provolone cheese & house-made croutons tossed in house vinaigrette or creamy gorgonzola

$11 / $16

Spinach Salad spinach, red onions, gorgonzola, red grapes & sunflower seeds tossed in house vinaigrette or creamy gorgonzola GF

$11 / $16

Greek Salad greens, red cabbage, kalamata olives*, tomatoes, red onions, pepperoncinis, feta & house-made croutons tossed in house vinaigrette

$12 / $17

Caesar Salad romaine, parmesan cheese & house-made croutons tossed in our caesar dressing ~ anchovies optional

$11 / $16

Antipasto Salad greens, red cabbage, pepperoni, salami, capicola, provolone, mozzarella, red onions, kalamata olives* & Mama Lil’s Sweet Hot Peppers tossed in house vinaigrette GF

$14 / $19

Add to Any Salad marinated grilled chicken, shrimp or marinated grilled steak for an additional cost

$3

Sandwiches

Baked on ciabatta bread & served with kettle chips. Any sandwich can be made gluten free if requested. GF Substitute Daiya vegan cheese on any sandwich - $1

Caprese provolone, pesto, tomatoes, spinach, basil and balsamic reduction

$13

Italian Hero salami, pepperoni, capicola, provolone, Mama Lil’s Sweet Hot Peppers, red onions & house vinaigrette

$13

Steak** & Cheese provolone, steak, caramelized onions, red onions, roasted mushrooms & horseradish mayo

$13

Marinated Grilled Chicken smoked gouda, chicken, applewood smoked bacon, red onions & chipotle crema

$13

Cuban Pulled Pork provolone, pulled pork, caramelized onions, jalapeños & aioli

$13

Side Salad instead of Chips

$2.50

Beverages

Draft Root Beer available by the glass or pitcher

$4.50 / $13

Soda Coke, Diet Coke, Coke Zero, Sprite, Mello Yello, Mr. Pibb, Lemonade ~ free refills

$3

Iced Tea or Hot Tea freshly brewed ~ free refills

$3

San Pellegrino Mineral Water

$3

Locally Sourced Coffee freshly brewed ~ free refills ~ ask your server for local selection

$3

House Pies

All of our pizzas begin with a blend of provolone & mozzarella on our house-made, hand-tossed dough. The crust is finished with roasted garlic oil & a pinch of salt (1/2 & 1/2 available on large pies). Any house pie can be made on a small size cauliflower crust or gluten free crust ~ add $2 GF Substitute Daiya vegan cheese on any pie - $1.50 small & $3 large

Pizza Pie mozzarella, provolone & tomato sauce

$12 / $20

White Pie mozzarella, provolone, ricotta, parmesan, olive oil, roasted garlic & fresh herbs

$13 / $21

Pizza By The Slice – Cheese available at select locations Monday – Friday until 2 pm.

$4.50

Pizza By The Slice – Pepperoni available at select locations Monday – Friday until 2 pm.

$5

Pizza By The Slice – Daily Special available at select locations Monday – Friday until 2 pm.

$5.50

Add Your Favorite Toppings banana peppers / seasoned black beans / fresh basil / fresh garlic / jalapeños / grapes / spinach / roasted garlic / red onions / seasoned corn / cheddar / anchovies / pepperoni / ham / pork sausage / salami / peppadew peppers / grape tomatoes

$2 / $3.50

Premium Toppings caramelized onions / kalamata olives* / fresh pineapple/ roasted mushrooms / Mama Lil’s Sweet Hot Peppers / fresh mozzarella / pesto / feta / goat cheese / gorgonzola / ricotta / smoked gouda / capicola / applewood smoked bacon / slow roasted pulled pork / shrimp / marinated / grilled steak** / marinated grilled chicken

$2.75 / $4.50

Specialty Pies

All of our specialty pies begin with a blend of provolone & mozzarella on our house-made, hand-tossed dough. The crust is finished with roasted garlic oil & a pinch of kosher salt. (1/2 & 1/2 available on large pies). Any specialty pie can be made on a small size cauliflower crust or gluten free crust ~ add $2 GF Substitute Daiya vegan cheese on any pie - $1.50 small & $3 large

* Olives may contain pits or pieces.

** Consuming raw or undercooked meat may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.

GF GLUTEN FREE

For customers with Celiac Disease or wheat allergies please be aware that our gluten free menu items are NOT made in a 100% gluten free environment, however we will do our best to make your food as gluten free as possible.

Download printer-friendly versions of our food menus.

Download a PDF of our food menu Download a PDF of our kids menu

Our Catering menu is available for carry out orders only. Please click on the “Food” tab to view our in-house menu.

Want to get a catering order started? The fastest and easiest way is to call your nearest Pies & Pints location and ask to speak to a manager.

Take a look at the menu below and kindly give us 24 hours notice. Same day ordering is available with menu limitations.
